title: Wings
filmcontent: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

title: The Broadway Melody
filmcontent: A pair of sisters from the vaudeville circuit try to make it big time on Broadway, but matters of the heart complicate the attempt.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
filmcontent: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

title: Cimarron
filmcontent: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

title: Grand Hotel
filmcontent: A group of very different individuals staying at a luxurious hotel in Berlin deal with each of their respective dramas.

title: Cavalcade
filmcontent: The triumphs and tragedies of two English families, the upper-crust Marryots and the working-class Bridges, from 1899 to 1933 are portrayed.

title: It Happened One Night
filmcontent: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
filmcontent: A tyrannical ship captain decides to exact revenge on his abused crew after they form a mutiny against him, but the sailor he targets had no hand in it.

title: The Great Ziegfeld
filmcontent: The ups and downs of Florenz Ziegfeld Jr., famed producer of extravagant stage revues, are portrayed.

title: The Life of Emile Zola
filmcontent: The biopic of the famous French muckraking writer and his involvement in fighting the injustice of the Dreyfuss Affair.

title: You Can't Take It with You
filmcontent: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

title: Gone with the Wind
filmcontent: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Rebecca
filmcontent: A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife.

title: How Green Was My Valley
filmcontent: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.

title: Mrs. Miniver
filmcontent: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

title: Casablanca
filmcontent: A cynical nightclub owner protects an old flame and her husband from Nazis in Morocco.

title: Going My Way
filmcontent: Father Charles O'Mailey, a young priest at a financially failing Church in a tough neighborhood, gains support and inspires his superior.

title: The Lost Weekend
filmcontent: The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
filmcontent: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: Gentleman's Agreement
filmcontent: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

title: Hamlet
filmcontent: Prince Hamlet struggles over whether or not he should kill his uncle, whom he suspects has murdered his father, the former King.

title: All the King's Men
filmcontent: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

title: All About Eve
filmcontent: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

title: An American in Paris
filmcontent: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

title: The Greatest Show on Earth
filmcontent: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

title: From Here to Eternity
filmcontent: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

title: On the Waterfront
filmcontent: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Marty
filmcontent: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: Around the World in 80 Days
filmcontent: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
filmcontent: After settling his differences with a Japanese P.O.W. camp commander, a British Colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors, while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

title: Gigi
filmcontent: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship, but it may not stay platonic for long.

title: Ben-Hur
filmcontent: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: The Apartment
filmcontent: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

title: West Side Story
filmcontent: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
filmcontent: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

title: Tom Jones
filmcontent: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th century England.

title: My Fair Lady
filmcontent: A snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

title: The Sound of Music
filmcontent: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

title: A Man for All Seasons
filmcontent: The story of Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.

title: In the Heat of the Night
filmcontent: An African-American police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

title: Oliver!
filmcontent: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

title: Midnight Cowboy
filmcontent: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.

title: Patton
filmcontent: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

title: The French Connection
filmcontent: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.

title: The Godfather
filmcontent: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Sting
filmcontent: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

title: The Godfather: Part II
filmcontent: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
filmcontent: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

title: Rocky
filmcontent: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Annie Hall
filmcontent: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

title: The Deer Hunter
filmcontent: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

title: Kramer vs. Kramer
filmcontent: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

title: Ordinary People
filmcontent: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.

title: Chariots of Fire
filmcontent: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

title: Gandhi
filmcontent: Gandhi's character is fully explained as a man of nonviolence. Through his patience, he is able to drive the British out of the subcontinent. And the stubborn nature of Jinnah and his commitment towards Pakistan is portrayed.

title: Terms of Endearment
filmcontent: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

title: Amadeus
filmcontent: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporary composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

title: Out of Africa
filmcontent: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

title: Platoon
filmcontent: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

title: The Last Emperor
filmcontent: The story of the final Emperor of China.

title: Rain Man
filmcontent: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

title: Driving Miss Daisy
filmcontent: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

title: Dances with Wolves
filmcontent: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
filmcontent: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Unforgiven
filmcontent: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

title: Schindler's List
filmcontent: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

title: Forrest Gump
filmcontent: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Braveheart
filmcontent: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

title: The English Patient
filmcontent: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: Titanic
filmcontent: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Shakespeare in Love
filmcontent: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: American Beauty
filmcontent: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: Gladiator
filmcontent: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: A Beautiful Mind
filmcontent: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

title: Chicago
filmcontent: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
filmcontent: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: Crash
filmcontent: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: Million Dollar Baby
filmcontent: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

title: The Departed
filmcontent: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: No Country for Old Men
filmcontent: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
filmcontent: A Mumbai teen reflects on his upbringing in the slums when he is accused of cheating on the Indian Version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?"

title: The Hurt Locker
filmcontent: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

title: The King's Speech
filmcontent: The story of King George VI, his impromptu ascension to the throne of the British Empire in 1936, and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch overcome his stammer.

title: The Artist
filmcontent: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Argo
filmcontent: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.

title: 12 Years a Slave
filmcontent: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
filmcontent: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

title: Spotlight
filmcontent: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: Moonlight
filmcontent: A chronicle of the childhood, adolescence and burgeoning adulthood of a young, African-American, gay man growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

title: The Shape of Water
filmcontent: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.
